text: Vila Valqueire is a neighborhood in the West Zone of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. This neighborhood is located in the borders of North and Western zones, and has a good quality of life with many squares, green places and services. Vila Valqueire is one of the best neighborhoods in the Western Zone, followed by Barra da Tijuca, Recreio dos Bandeirantes, Praça Seca, Jacarepaguá, Freguesia and Anil. Vila Valqueire is the home of Mulher Melão (famous funk dancer), Mulher Melancia (another famous dancer) and Hebert Neri (musician). Category:Neighbourhoods in Rio de Janeiro (city)
title: Vila Valqueire
